title: Ambient Video Game Music - Prairies
description: Dive into the serene expanse of the Canadian prairies with this captivating collection of 10 ambient tracks.
longDescription:
Dive into the serene expanse of the Canadian prairies with this captivating collection of 10 ambient tracks. Each sound in this set is designed to breathe life into game environments, crafting a sense of space and tranquillity that is unique to the vast, open landscapes of the prairies.


Immerse your players in the natural harmony of the Canadian prairies, characterized by the lively chatter of birds and the symphony of insects that mark the rhythm of the day. Experience the occasional patter of rain, a refreshing break in the continuity that paints a vivid, realistic portrayal of this magnificent landscape.


Game developers looking to enhance their gaming environments with high-quality, realistic ambient soundscapes will find this collection indispensable. Whether it's for a leisurely exploration game or a gripping adventure set in the wilderness, these tracks add a layer of immersion that can transform the gaming experience. Transport your players into the heart of the Canadian prairies, where the stillness of nature sings its own compelling song.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wev_ceqBysI

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TRNi0uPAMsU


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:
